text: Gabriel Felix Kofi Amo (born December 11, 1987) is an American politician. He is the current U.S. representative for . Before he became a representative, Amo worked in the Biden administration as the deputy director of the White House Office of Intergovernmental Affairs. He has also worked in the Obama administration, on several Democratic political campaigns, and in the administration of Rhode Island governor Gina Raimondo. ==References== Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Rhode Island Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:African-American politicians Category:21st-century American politicians
title: Gabe Amo
